member.name: D2D1_ARC_SEGMENT
member.summary: Describes an elliptical arc between two points.

member.name: D2D1_ARC_SEGMENT.point
member.summary: The end point of the arc.

member.name: D2D1_ARC_SEGMENT.size
member.summary: The x-radius and y-radius of the arc.

member.name: D2D1_ARC_SEGMENT.rotationAngle
member.summary: A value that specifies how many degrees in the clockwise direction the ellipse is rotated relative to the current coordinate system.

member.name: D2D1_ARC_SEGMENT.sweepDirection
member.summary: A value that specifies whether the arc sweep is clockwise or counterclockwise.

member.name: D2D1_ARC_SEGMENT.arcSize
member.summary: A value that specifies whether the given arc is larger than 180 degrees.
